name: FROGJUMPER 2022
description:
FROGJUMPER 2022 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Frog City, where you play as a frog wrapped-up in a do-or-die fight for survival. Explore the dark future, now upgraded with next-gen in mind and featuring free additional content!

FROGJUMPER 2022 is an extremely not good platformer for the 3-day 2022 Summer MoonJam hosted by twitch.tv/moonmoon, and I'm glad I was able to actually put anything together.
